resources.string: Sorry cannot upgrade to unofficial ROM package
ROM package is in internal testing, please go to the forum to download the released ROM package
Sorry, we cannot support rollback to a non-sub-latest previous version
The development version cannot flash non-latest stable versions, please go to the forum to download the latest stable versions
The stable version cannot flash the non-latest development version, please go to the forum to download the latest development version
Due to internal reasons, the ROM information has been deleted, please go to the forum to download the latest version
The current version is illegal, you can only upgrade to the latest stable version online
Unable to switch the development stable version across Android versions, please try Fastboot to solve the problem
The selected ROM package does not match the currently connected mobile phone model, or for other reasons
10002: The same IP request is too frequent
The unlocking interval for different devices needs to be greater than 30 days
There is no binding relationship between the account and the device
Failed to generate signature value required for unlocking
User profile score is too low or blacklisted
The current account cannot unlock this device
Please download the latest unlocking tool
The account and device binding time is too short, please try again in %d hours
The number of unlocks has reached the upper limit
Please select the card swiping package...
Verifying whether the phone is in a split state
Getting mobile phone backup software version
The backup time varies depending on the amount of data. If the mobile phone has more data, the backup time will be longer, please wait patiently
If there is a lot of data on your phone, the backup will take a long time, please wait patiently
Please back up current mobile phone data
Please select the data to be backed up
Data has been selected to be backed up of%.2fGB
Continuously click [MIUI Version] until it prompts, "You are now in developer mode!"
Enable [USB debugging], as shown in the prompt, click [OK] to enable USB debugging
This operation requires logging in to a Xiaomi account
Please follow the steps below to open USB installation
Failed to compress the file, please try again!
L"Invalid flash package, please select again:"
Are you sure you want to cancel the download?
Switching mobile phone connection mode successfully
The current Recovery version of the phone is too low and the tool is not supported yet. Please try other ways to upgrade
Connection abnormality, please re-enter Recovery mode to flash your phone
Failed to start connecting to mobile phone service, please reconnect to mobile phone
Please click the confirmation button on your phone to authorize the operation
If you do not see the prompt on the phone, after unlocking the phone, click the confirmation button to resend the authorization request
Are you sure you want to permanently delete the selected%dfiles?
The backup has not ended yet. Are you sure you want to stop the backup?
The recovery has not ended yet. Are you sure you want to stop the recovery?
The recovery has not ended yet. Are you sure you want to stop the recovery and switch pages?
The backup has not ended yet. Are you sure you want to stop the backup and switch pages?
Should you close the software to complete the upgrade?
Please switch to the main space for backup/restore operations
Avatar space does not currently support backup using Xiaomi Assistant
Please complete the boot process before performing the backup/restore operation
Failed to obtain MD5 flash package
The selected backup file is invalid, please select again.
Please select the data to be restored
Please check the type of data you want to restore
Data has been selected to be restored, size=%.2fGB
